cause.description:
To successfully elect Weston Fillman to a Student Senate Seat this coming fall at Franlkin & Marshall.
I feel that I can make a difference and I believe that a lot of students have faith in me that my extroverted personality combined with my drive and ambition, I can help to make F&M a better place and serve my constituents (F&M Students) to the best of my ability.
1. To Elect Weston Fillman to a Student Senate Position.
2. To promote fair elections and elect a class leader that is compassionate for not only his fellow students but the college.
3. Elect a student that cares about the direction of the college and one who will work hard to change the class and college for the better.
cause.mission: Elect Weston Fillman to a Student Senate Seat for the F&M Class of 2011, hopefully President
cause.name: Weston Fillman for F&M Student Senate 2011
